name.ch: 混合現實的原理與應用

department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: “This course aiming at mixed reality intends to provide knowledge in regard with theory, technique and application. The course contents consider the width and the depth of the mixed reality associated knowledge. Further, students will catch up the advanced research topics via the latest-paper reading.“
goal.ch: 本課程對於混合現實技術領域，讓學習者針對理論、技術實踐以及終端應用，建立一體化的知識基礎，課程內容廣泛且深入，同時透過最新期刊論文的研讀，可以和國際相??域最先進的研究同步。

content.en:
“Computer graphics and animation
Immersive display technology
Haptics
Interactive technology
Virtual Reality
Augmented Reality
Application on neuro-motor rehabilitation
Application on neuro-cognitive rehabilitation
Application on mental treatment
Application on education
“
content.ch:
“電腦圖學與動畫技術
沉浸式顯示技術
觸覺模擬技術
互動式感測技術
虛擬現實系統
增強現實系統
神經運動復健的應用
神經認知刺激的應用
精神與心理醫療的應用
教學實訓的應用
“

grading.ch:
“作業: 30％
期中考: 20％
期末考: 30％
論文閱讀簡報: 20％
“
